Pre-Game Insights: The Milwaukee Bucks will face the Cleveland Cavaliers on November 4th, 2024. The Cavaliers are currently undefeated and atop the Eastern Conference, while the Bucks have struggled to a 1-5 record.
The Cavaliers are 7.5-point home favorites as of Monday morning.
The total is set at 228 points.
